languages.text: Сервитор превосходит обычного работника во всем — он функционален, долговечен, и мозг его лишен излишних для служения процессов. Кьява Гамма способна обеспечить слугами из плоти и металла все миры протектората, если им будут предоставлены соответствующие объемы человеческого сырья. Новое производство будет развернуто в древнем и почтенному цеху, законсервированном годы назад по приказу Леди Теодоры.

traits.locale_text: Открываем новую континентальную фабрику массовой сервиторизации. Каждому миру Валанциусов по миллиону сервиторов.

languages.text: A servitor is superior to an ordinary worker in every way, being efficient, durable, and devoid of service-irrelevant brain processes. Kiava Gamma will have the capacity to provide the entire protectorate with servants of flesh and metal, once given appropriate amounts of human raw materials. The new production line will be deployed at an ancient and venerated workshop decommissioned for preservation years ago by Lady Theodora's order.
languages.original_text: Сервитор превосходит обычного работника во всем — он функционален, долговечен, и мозг его лишен излишних для служения процессов. Кьява Гамма способна обеспечить слугами из плоти и металла все миры протектората, если им будут предоставлены соответствующие объемы человеческого сырья. Новое производство будет развернуто в древнем и почтенному цеху, законсервированном годы назад по приказу Леди Теодоры.

traits.locale_text: A servitor is superior to an ordinary worker in every way, being efficient, durable, and devoid of service-irrelevant brain processes. Kiava Gamma will have the capacity to provide the entire trade empire with servants of flesh and metal, once given appropriate amounts of human raw materials. The new production line will be deployed at the ancient and venerated workshop of Null Khalif, decommissioned for preservation many centuries ago.

Kiava Gamma will have the capacity to provide the entire trade empire with servants of flesh and metal, once given appropriate amounts of human raw materials. The new production line will be deployed at the ancient and venerated workshop of Null Khalif, decommissioned for preservation many centuries ago.

Kiava Gamma will have the capacity to provide the entire trade empire with servants of flesh and metal, once given appropriate amounts of human raw materials. The new production line will be deployed at the ancient and venerated workshop of Null Caliph, decommissioned for preservation many centuries ago.

A servitor is superior to an ordinary worker in every way, being efficient, durable, and devoid of service-irrelevant brain processes. Kiava Gamma will have the capacity to provide the entire trade empire with servants of flesh and metal, once given appropriate amounts of human raw materials. The new production line will be deployed at the ancient and venerated workshop of Null Caliph, decommissioned for preservation many centuries ago.

A servitor is superior to an ordinary worker in every way, being efficient, durable, and devoid of service-irrelevant brain processes. Kiava Gamma will have the capacity to provide the entire protectorate with servants of flesh and metal, once given appropriate amounts of human raw materials. The new production line will be deployed at an ancient and venerated workshop decommissioned for preservation years ago by Lady Theodora's order.

languages.text: Un servidor es superior a un trabajador normal en todos los aspectos. Son eficaces, resistentes y carecen de procesos mentales irrelevantes para su labor. Kiava Gamma podrá suministrar a todo el protectorado sirvientes de carne y metal una vez reciba suficientes recursos humanos. La nueva cadena de montaje se instalará en un taller antiguo y venerado que lady Theodora ordenó desactivar para su conservación hace años.
languages.original_text: A servitor is superior to an ordinary worker in every way, being efficient, durable, and devoid of service-irrelevant brain processes. Kiava Gamma will have the capacity to provide the entire protectorate with servants of flesh and metal, once given appropriate amounts of human raw materials. The new production line will be deployed at an ancient and venerated workshop decommissioned for preservation years ago by Lady Theodora's order.

traits.locale_text: Un servidor es superior a un trabajador normal en todos los aspectos. Son eficaces, resistentes y carecen de procesos mentales irrelevantes para su labor. Kiava Gamma podrá suministrar a todo el protectorado sirvientes de carne y metal una vez reciba suficientes recursos humanos. La nueva cadena de montaje se instalará en un taller antiguo y venerado que lady Theodora ordenó desactivar para su conservación hace años.

languages.text: Les servitors surpassent les ouvriers classiques dans tous les domaines : ils sont efficaces, robustes et dépourvus de processus cognitifs inutiles à leur labeur. À condition de lui fournir la matière première humaine en quantités nécessaires, Kiava Gamma sera en mesure de fabriquer suffisamment de serviteurs de chair et de métal pour approvisionner le protectorat tout entier. La nouvelle chaîne de production sera installée sur le site d'un ancien atelier sacré, mis hors service et préservé sur ordre de dame Théodora, il y a des années de cela.
languages.original_text: A servitor is superior to an ordinary worker in every way, being efficient, durable, and devoid of service-irrelevant brain processes. Kiava Gamma will have the capacity to provide the entire protectorate with servants of flesh and metal, once given appropriate amounts of human raw materials. The new production line will be deployed at an ancient and venerated workshop decommissioned for preservation years ago by Lady Theodora's order.

traits.locale_text: Les servitors surpassent les ouvriers classiques dans tous les domaines : ils sont efficaces, robustes et dépourvus de processus cognitifs inutiles à leur labeur. À condition de lui fournir la matière première humaine en quantités nécessaires, Kiava Gamma sera en mesure de fabriquer suffisamment de serviteurs de chair et de métal pour approvisionner le protectorat tout entier. La nouvelle chaîne de production sera installée sur le site d'un ancien atelier sacré, mis hors service et préservé sur ordre de dame Théodora, il y a des années de cela.

languages.text: 相较于普通工人，机仆拥有得天独厚的全方位优势。它高效、耐用，而且不会进行与劳动无关的大脑活动。只要提供充足的人体原材料，基亚瓦伽马星就能够以血肉与金属为原料，生产出足以服侍整个王朝的机仆。新的生产线将部署在某个著名的远古作坊中，该作坊已在多年前由西奥多拉夫人下令停止生产。
languages.original_text: A servitor is superior to an ordinary worker in every way, being efficient, durable, and devoid of service-irrelevant brain processes. Kiava Gamma will have the capacity to provide the entire protectorate with servants of flesh and metal, once given appropriate amounts of human raw materials. The new production line will be deployed at an ancient and venerated workshop decommissioned for preservation years ago by Lady Theodora's order.

traits.locale_text: 相较于普通工人，奴工拥有得天独厚的全方位优势。它高效、耐用，而且不会进行与劳动无关的大脑活动。只要提供充足的人体原材料，基亚瓦伽马星就能够以血肉与金属为原谅，生产出足以服侍整个王朝的奴工。新的生产线将部署在某个著名的远古作坊中，该作坊已在多年前由西奥多拉夫人下令停止生产。

languages.text: サーヴィターは、あらゆる面で普通の労働者より優れている。効率的かつ耐久性に優れ、奉仕に無関係な脳のプロセスがない。キアヴァ・ガンマは、適切な量の原材料たる人間が与えられれば、保護領全体に肉と金属のしもべを供給する能力を持つ。新しい製造ラインは、数年前にレディ・シオドーラの命令で保存のために廃止された、古くからの由緒ある工房に配備される予定だ。
languages.original_text: A servitor is superior to an ordinary worker in every way, being efficient, durable, and devoid of service-irrelevant brain processes. Kiava Gamma will have the capacity to provide the entire protectorate with servants of flesh and metal, once given appropriate amounts of human raw materials. The new production line will be deployed at an ancient and venerated workshop decommissioned for preservation years ago by Lady Theodora's order.

traits.locale_text: サーヴィターは、あらゆる面で普通の労働者より優れている。効率的かつ耐久性に優れ、奉仕に無関係な脳のプロセスがない。キアヴァ・ガンマは、適切な量の原材料たる人間が与えられれば、保護領全体に肉と金属のしもべを供給する能力を持つ。新しい製造ラインは、数年前にレディ・シオドーラの命令で保存のために廃止された、古くからの由緒ある工房に配備される予定だ。

languages.text: Ein Servitor ist einem gewöhnlicher Arbeiter in allen Belangen überlegen. Er ist effizient, haltbar und weist keine für seinen Dienst irrelevanten Gehirnprozesse auf. Kiava Gamma wird die Kapazität besitzen, das gesamte Protektorat mit Dienern aus Fleisch und Metall zu versorgen, sobald ausreichende Mengen an menschlichem Rohmaterial zur Verfügung stehen. Die neue Fertigungslinie wird in einer uralten und angesehenen Werkstatt in Betrieb genommen, die vor Jahren auf Befehl von Lady Theodora stillgelegt worden ist.
languages.original_text: A servitor is superior to an ordinary worker in every way, being efficient, durable, and devoid of service-irrelevant brain processes. Kiava Gamma will have the capacity to provide the entire protectorate with servants of flesh and metal, once given appropriate amounts of human raw materials. The new production line will be deployed at an ancient and venerated workshop decommissioned for preservation years ago by Lady Theodora's order.

traits.locale_text: Ein Servitor ist einem gewöhnlicher Arbeiter in allen Belangen überlegen. Er ist effizient, haltbar und weist keine für seinen Dienst irrelevanten Gehirnprozesse auf. Kiava Gamma wird die Kapazität besitzen, das gesamte Protektorat mit Dienern aus Fleisch und Metall zu versorgen, sobald ausreichende Mengen an menschlichem Rohmaterial zur Verfügung stehen. Die neue Fertigungslinie wird in einer uralten und angesehenen Werkstatt in Betrieb genommen, die vor Jahren auf Befehl von Lady Theodora stillgelegt worden ist.

languages.text: Hizmetörler, sıradan işçilerden her alanda üstündür. Verimli, dayanıklı ve hizmet dışı beyinsel faaliyetlerden mahrum olmaları sağlar bunu. Kiava Gama, yeterli sayıda insan ham maddeleri ulaştırıldığında bütün protektoraya etten ve metalden yapılma hizmetörler sunacak. Yeni üretim hattı, korunması için Leydi Theodora'nın emriyle atıl hâle getirilen kadim ve mukaddes bir atölyeye kurulacak.
languages.original_text: A servitor is superior to an ordinary worker in every way, being efficient, durable, and devoid of service-irrelevant brain processes. Kiava Gamma will have the capacity to provide the entire protectorate with servants of flesh and metal, once given appropriate amounts of human raw materials. The new production line will be deployed at an ancient and venerated workshop decommissioned for preservation years ago by Lady Theodora's order.
